: : Darkangel : :
Darkangel: We apologize for asking so many questions. But it is surprising to see a Guardian Robot functioning in this day and age. Are you looking to join faction?


cardhead649 <cardhead649@...> wrote:
"What is this, anyway?"  Synergy takes a menacing step forward.  "I'm 
not in the mood to play Twenty Questions!"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Dreadplague: And what brings you to Earth now?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> 
wrote:
> > Synergy glares down at the technorganic-2 femme.  "'Letting' had 
> > nothing to do with it," she growls.  "I left, plain and simple.  
The 
> > Autobots were too busy cracking heads with the Decepticons to go 
> > looking for me at the time, and afterwards they forgot about me."
> >

claw -
